name: X Days Till Death
description:
Game: Last night a crazy witch casted a curse against you using her magical dice, now you only got X days till death. Can you survive the nights and break the curse?

X Days Till Death is mainly a Platformer game that allowed me to try and create a satisfactory Platformer Controller with all the features these game movement systems present: Acceleration/Decceleration curves, variable Jump Height, Coyote Time, and so on. If anyone is interested here is a link to its Github repository.

Controls: Controls are explained in-game as well.

WASD/Left Stick ---> Movement

Space Bar/South Button ---> Jump, hold to jump higher

Mouse/Right Stick ---> Look around

Right Mouse Button/East Button/North Button ---> Dash

Hold E/West  Button ---> Interact
